data.title: ETFs will usher institutions into altcoins, just like Bitcoin: Analyst
data.description:
Spot Ether ETF inflows have surpassed Bitcoin ETFs during the third quarter of 2025, signaling dormant appetite for regulated altcoin investments.
source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/institutions-discover-altcoins-etfs-bitcoin-ethereum-analyst?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound

data.title: zCloak Network launches an AI-human collaborative multi-signature wallet based on the x402 protocol, achieving a breakthrough in on-chain payments for intelligent agents.
data.description: zCloak Network today announced the official launch of its multi-signature wallet system supporting the x402 protocol. This system innovatively enables seamless collaboration between AI agents and humans in on-chain asset operations, marking a significant advancement for AI as a multi-signature party in real-world x402 protocol asset transfers. On the zCloak.Money multi-signature platform, the AI ​​agent can act as an independent signer, autonomously initiating USDC payment requests based on the x402 protocol. After the AI ​​completes the signature conforming to the EIP-3009 specification on the server side, the transaction, carrying the "x402" identifier, is pushed to the pending list of human collaborators. After manual review and secondary signature, the payment process is complete. In the future, AI can assist in handling various on-chain stablecoin payment scenarios, including computing resource procurement, API call settlement, and data service payments, improving enterprise resource allocation efficiency and automation levels. zCloak.Money is a fully on-chain self-custodied enterprise multisignature wallet built by zCloak Network, dedicated to providing institutional users with secure, transparent, and auditable on-chain asset management solutions.

data.title: Institutional Interest in Altcoin ETFs Grows Amid Regulatory Developments
data.description:
According to Cointelegraph, institutional investors are increasingly focusing on altcoins as the next wave of cryptocurrency exchange-traded funds (ETFs) emerges in the United States. Despite the ongoing U.S. government shutdown, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has received at least five new altcoin ETF filings in the first half of October. Market analysts suggest that each approval could pave the way for increased institutional buying. Leon Waidmann, head of research at Web3 analytics firm Onchain, noted that altcoin ETF inflows are a natural progression following the success of Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs, which have demonstrated significant institutional demand. This regulatory confidence is expected to translate into substantial capital flows.

Spot Ether (ETH) ETFs have notably surpassed Bitcoin (BTC) ETF inflows in the third quarter of 2025, attracting $9.6 billion compared to Bitcoin's $8.7 billion, as reported by data aggregator SosoValue. This shift indicates a growing institutional appetite for alternative crypto exposure. Analysts predict that altcoin ETFs could drive the next wave of institutional adoption, potentially resulting in sustained inflows over the coming years. Waidmann emphasized that institutions initially discovered Bitcoin through ETFs and are now expanding into Ethereum, with other altcoins likely to follow.

The industry's top traders, identified as "smart money" on Nansen's blockchain intelligence platform, are strategically positioning themselves for the anticipated approval of altcoin ETFs. Data from Nansen reveals that Uniswap (UNI), Aave (AAVE), and Chainlink (LINK) are the most held tokens by these traders. However, some analysts express concerns about the absence of BlackRock from the altcoin ETF landscape, which could limit overall inflows. BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF has amassed $28.1 billion in investments in 2025, making it the only fund with positive year-to-date inflows. Without BlackRock's participation, spot Bitcoin ETFs have recorded a cumulative net outflow of $1.27 billion year-to-date, according to Vetle Lunde, head of research at K33. Lunde explained that BlackRock's absence might restrict cumulative inflows and their potential impact on the underlying tokens, based on the dynamics observed in Bitcoin ETF investments.

data.title: Putin‑Trump summit called off after Moscow sticks to hardline demands in tense phone call
data.description:
The planned Budapest summit between Trump and Putin was cancelled after Moscow refused to soften demands on Ukraine.
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/putin%e2%80%91trump-meeting-called-off/

data.title: Binance Wallet Opens Alpha Airdrop Claims Today at 12:00 UTC for Users With 240+ Alpha Points
data.description: Key Takeaways:Binance Wallet announced that Alpha Airdrop claims open today at 12:00 UTC.Users with at least 240 Binance Alpha Points are eligible to claim rewards.The airdrop operates on a first-come, first-served basis until the pool is fully distributed or the event expires.Further token details and distribution rules will be announced via Binance’s official channels.Binance Wallet has officially announced that Alpha Airdrop claiming will open today, October 31, at 12:00 UTC (16:00 Dubai time). Eligible users with 240 or more Binance Alpha Points can participate in the event through the Binance Alpha Events page, where they will be able to claim rewards on a first-come, first-served basis.The claiming window will remain open until either the reward pool is fully distributed or the airdrop event expires. Binance has advised participants to prepare their accounts in advance and ensure sufficient Alpha Points are available before the claim time.While the specific token(s) for this round of the airdrop have yet to be disclosed, Binance confirmed that details will be released shortly through official announcement channels, including the Binance App, website, and X (formerly Twitter).The Binance Alpha Airdrop campaign is part of the platform’s broader effort to reward active community participants and provide exclusive early access to emerging crypto projects through point-based engagement and limited-time reward events.How to Prepare for the Binance Alpha AirdropCheck your Alpha Points balance: Ensure you have at least 240 points before 12:00 UTC.Visit the Alpha Events page: Claims will open directly on the Binance App or website.Act quickly: The event follows a first-come, first-served structure, meaning early participation increases your chances.Monitor official updates: Follow Binance on X and Telegram for real-time details on the specific token and next airdrop rounds.

data.title: Binance Wallet to Suspend AI16Z Trading on November 6 for Token Swap to ELIZAOS
data.description: Key Takeaways:Trading suspension: AI16Z trading on Binance Alpha 2.0 will be temporarily halted on Nov 6, 2025, at 10:00 UTC.Token swap: All AI16Z tokens will be converted to ELIZAOS at a ratio of 1 AI16Z = 6 ELIZAOS.Deposits suspended: AI16Z deposits will stop at 10:00 UTC on Nov 6 and will not resume after the swap.Trading resumes: ELIZAOS trading and deposits will reopen on Nov 7, 2025, at 02:00 UTC.Binance Wallet announced that Binance Alpha 2.0 will temporarily suspend AI16Z trading on November 6, 2025, at 10:00 (UTC) to facilitate a scheduled token swap from AI16Z to ELIZAOS.Starting at that time, AI16Z deposits to Binance Alpha 2.0 Accounts will be disabled, and users are advised to complete any pending deposits well before the cutoff to ensure successful processing.Once the event concludes, AI16Z deposits will no longer be supported, and all remaining AI16Z balances in users’ Binance Alpha 2.0 accounts will be automatically converted to ELIZAOS at a 1:6 ratio (1 AI16Z = 6 ELIZAOS).Following the swap, trading and deposits for ELIZAOS will officially resume on November 7, 2025, at 02:00 (UTC).Binance thanked users for their understanding and ongoing support, emphasizing that the conversion process is part of the continuous upgrade of Binance Alpha 2.0’s ecosystem to enhance liquidity and streamline project migrations.

data.title: BNB Chain Completes Compensation for Phishing Incident
data.description:
According to PANews, BNB Chain has announced the completion of compensation for users affected by a recent phishing link incident. Details of the transactions can be viewed on Etherscan. The incident was attributed to phishing links, which have now been removed and controlled.

The official statement revealed that the incident involved 10 phishing links, resulting in a total loss of $8,000, with one user losing $6,500. The attackers deployed phishing contract addresses, injecting $17,800 and exchanging it for $22,000 worth of tokens. In response, the team has implemented additional security measures to prevent similar incidents and enhance account protection.

Earlier, on October 1, there were reports suggesting that BNB Chain's official Twitter account might have been compromised, prompting users to exercise caution when clicking on links.

data.title: Garden Finance Goes Offline After $11 Million Exploit as ZachXBT Links Exploit to Team
data.description:
Blockchain investigator ZachXBT disputed Garden Finance’s explanation of a $10. 8 million exploit on Oct. 30 after tracing on-chain evidence that linked the compromised solver directly to the protocol’s founding team. ZachXBT posted at 13:33 UTC that Garden Finance “was likely exploited for $10
source: https://www.thecoinrepublic.com/2025/10/31/garden-finance-goes-offline-after-11-million-exploit-as-zachxbt-links-exploit-to-team/

data.title: Semantic Layer raises $5 million in Series A funding, led by Greenfield Capital.
data.description: According to official sources, AI infrastructure project Semantic Layer has announced the completion of a $5 million Series A funding round, led by Greenfield Capital. The funds will be used to advance on-chain AI autonomous agents, decentralized applications, and the establishment of ordering sovereignty for assets.

data.title: dYdX Eyes US Market Entry: Decentralized Crypto Exchange Plans Year-End Debut, Reuters
data.description:
dYdX (DYDX), one of the leading decentralized cryptocurrency trading platforms in the industry, is reportedly preparing to enter the US market by the end of the year, following the recent shift in crypto policies by the Trump administration. dYdX Expands Amid Supportive Legislation In an interview with Reuters, Eddie Zhang, the president of dYdX, emphasized the importance of this move, stating that having a presence in the United States aligns with the platform’s future direction. Unlike centralized exchanges such as Coinbase (COIN) and Kraken, which act as intermediaries between buyers and sellers, dYdX aims to eliminate the middleman, allowing users to transact directly on a blockchain network that underpins cryptocurrencies. Related Reading: Bitcoin Price Path Ahead: 10 Indicators Converge For Market Surge, End-Of-2025 Projections The platform specializes in perpetual contracts, a form of derivative that enables traders to speculate on asset prices without ownership and without an expiration date, distinguishing it from traditional futures contracts
source: https://www.newsbtc.com/news/dydx-eyes-us-market-entry-decentralized-crypto-exchange-plans-year-end-debut-reuters/

data.title: Binance Alpha and Binance Futures will support the renaming of the AI16Z token to ELIZAOS.
data.description: According to the official announcement, Binance Alpha and Binance Futures will support the exchange, repricing and renaming of the ai16z (AI16Z) token on November 6, 2025. The token will be renamed elizaOS (ELIZAOS).

data.title: Gate launches CrossEx, a cross-exchange trading platform, to create a unified account and clearing and settlement system.
data.description: Cryptocurrency trading platform Gate.co.uk has announced the official launch of its cross-exchange trading and clearing platform, CrossEx. Targeting professional investors, quantitative trading teams, and institutional clients, the platform aims to break down operational barriers between multiple exchanges, enabling a unified account system and cross-exchange fund coordination, thereby improving strategy execution and capital utilization efficiency. CrossEx allows users to access major exchanges through a single account, currently supporting Gate.co.uk, Binance, and OKX. Its underlying architecture is compatible with the financial rules of different exchanges and adopts a unified API standard, significantly reducing system access and maintenance costs. The platform supports cross-exchange margin sharing and profit/loss offsetting, and trading volume can be aggregated, optimizing capital efficiency and fee structure. In terms of performance and risk control, CrossEx employs a low-latency matching and standardized clearing and settlement architecture to ensure the stable execution of high-frequency and large-volume trades. In terms of application scenarios, CrossEx is suitable for cross-exchange arbitrage and CTA strategies, enabling simultaneous order placement and liquidity allocation across multiple exchanges, providing institutions with a more efficient and transparent multi-market trading experience.

data.title: MGBX launches COOKIE (Cookie DAO) and ANON (Hey Anon).
data.description: According to official news, MGBX will list COOKIE (Cookie DAO) and ANON (Hey Anon) for spot trading on October 31, 2025 at 18:00 (SGT). Deposits will open at 16:00 (SGT) on October 31, 2025. Trading will open at 18:00 (SGT) on October 31, 2025. Withdrawals will open at 19:00 (SGT) on November 3, 2025.

data.title: BNB Chain: Compensation has been fully distributed to users affected by the X account attack.
data.description: According to official sources, BNB Chain stated that following the attack on its X account, the team has completed compensation payments to all affected users. Furthermore, BNB Chain has implemented several additional security measures to prevent similar incidents from recurring and has further strengthened its account protection system.

data.title: BNB Chain Enhances Security Measures Following Account Breach
data.description: According to Odaily, BNB Chain has announced that it has completed compensation for all users affected by a recent attack on its X account. In response to the incident, the team has implemented additional security measures to prevent similar occurrences and strengthen the account protection system.
